attributes.additional_details: juke is a pitbull type dog who has been sencetenced to death for something that was not his fault we want you to give him one more chance. Duke is a lovely playfully well behaved dog who was just in the wrong place at the wrong time. although the owner is well aware duke should not been off his lead he was in a empty quite people free area when 2 staffie come up and attacked him and duke done what any dog would and defended him self although the other dogs were injured both dog were perfectly fine. duke doesn't deserve to die hes never hurt anyone and never would please dont punish him :-)
